resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">Detail of an illuminated medallion containing the word <em style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">‘ashr<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;"> in gold <em style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">kufic<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;"> script indicating the end of a tenth verse (<a style="color: #0066ff; text-decoration-line: none; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;" href="http://access.bl.uk/item/viewer/ark:/81055/vdc_100057224650.0x000001?&_ga=2.175199586.1933841716.1642607444-1458020893.1630496159#?c=0&m=0&s=0&cv=190&xywh=0%2C-4980%2C5747%2C18190" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BL Add MS 22409, f. 92r<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">)
resource.chars: Detail of an illuminated medallion containing the word ‘ashr in gold kufic script indicating the end of a tenth verse (BL Add MS 22409, f. 92r)
